price: ទេ. ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ បញ្ជីរបស់បណ្ដាអ្នកដែលសាង អំពើល្អ គឺស្ថិតក្នុងអ៊ីល្លីយូន។
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-abrāri lafī ʿilliyyīna
